items.name: ExpansionPanel
items.description: An Expansion Panel is a lightweight container that may either stand alone or be connected to a larger surface

items.name: SwipeableView
items.description: A Swipeable View panel is a lightweight container that may either stand alone or be connected to a larger surface

items.name: Grid
items.description: Grid Container

items.name: Label
items.description: This is a simple Label component, represents a single line of text, It does not broadcast any events

items.name: TextField
items.description: This is a Text Input component for fetching text data from user

items.name: NumericField
items.description: This is a Numeric Text Input for fetching numeric only data

items.name: TextView
items.description: This is a Text Area component for fetching multi-line text input

items.name: Image
items.description: This component enables to display images from the library of Images

items.name: Avatar
items.description: This component enables to display images from the library of Images

items.name: WebView
items.description: This component enables to display web pages or online content

items.name: Link
items.description: This is a Link-label component, used for navigation to a given URL

items.name: SearchBar
items.description: This is used to search or filter data displayed to the user

items.name: Round
items.description: This is a perfect Round Button

items.name: Text
items.description: This button can display some text or image

items.name: Image
items.description: This button enables to display image of users choice

items.name: Icon
items.description: This button enables to display image of users choice

items.name: Switch
items.description: This portrays a slider control, a toggle switch to select between two options

items.name: Toggle
items.description: This portrays an On or Off control, to change setting between two states

items.name: Check
items.description: Use Check boxes for options that users can select or clear

items.name: Radio
items.description: This UI enables users to choose or select only one of a predefined set of options.

items.name: Segment
items.description: This portrays a horizontal group of buttons, with an option to define Events on each

items.name: Action
items.description: Use System buttons for standard system specific icons and controls

items.name: System
items.description: Use System buttons for standard system specific icons and controls

items.name: Camera
items.description: This control enables for using Camera device

items.name: SoundBox
items.description: This control enables for playing Music on a player

items.name: VideoBox
items.description: This control enables for playing Video on a video player

items.name: GoogleMap
items.description: This control enables for displaying (Google) maps on a device

items.name: Calendar
items.description: This provides an interface to set the Date

items.name: DatePicker
items.description: This provides an interface to set the date, the time or the date and time, depending on the mode selected

items.name: ComboBox
items.description: This widget provides the users to either type a value directly into the control or choose from the list of existing options.

items.name: Picker
items.description: This provides an interface to choose multiple values, similar to a drop down menu

items.name: TileList
items.description: A db-scrollable List which have items in multiple rows & columns

items.name: Tabs
items.description: It organize and allow navigation between groups of content that are related and at the same level of hierarchy

items.name: Slider
items.description: This is used to select value by moving slider thumb between the end points of the slider track

items.name: Chart
items.description: This is used to display data as Chart

items.name: HeatMap
items.description: This control enables Heat map layer on Google maps on a device

items.name: LiveFeed
items.description: This is used to show live data coming from any feed/ stream

items.name: Dialog
items.description: This provides a overlay dialog window which have custom content & a set of actions

items.name: Drawer
items.description: This provides a draggable window which have custom content & a set of actions

items.name: Skeleton
items.description: Display a placeholder preview of your content before the data gets loaded to reduce load-time frustration.

items.name: Indicator
items.description: This enables for displaying an indicator while loading some data

items.name: Progress
items.description: This provides a visual representation of the progress of a task or event over time
